Book summaries

Loading...

Title Description Author Rate Date Started Date Read Status Action
{{ book.title }} {{ book.description | slice : 0 : 50 }}... {{ book.author }} {{ book.rate }} {{ book.dateStart | date : "dd/MM/yyyy" }} {{ book.dateRead | date : "dd/MM/yyyy" }} {{ book.dateRead ? "Read" : book.dateStart ? "In Progress" : "Not Started" }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Book } from '../../interfaces/book'; import { BookDataService } from '../../Services/book-data.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-books', templateUrl: './books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./books.component.css'], }) export class BooksComponent { public books: Book[] = []; constructor(private service: BookDataService, private router: Router) { this.service.getAllBooks().subscribe((data) => { this.books = data; }); } showBook(id: number) { this.router.navigate(['/show-book/' + id]); } updateBook(id: number) { this.router.navigate(['/update-book/' + id]); } deleteBook(id: number) { this.router.navigate(['/delete-book/' + id]); } }
